channel.title: Project-rsses on Sujay Narumanchi
channel.description: Recent content in Project-rsses on Sujay Narumanchi

item.title: Deep Learning based Large Scale Visual Search and Recommender System
item.description: Check out the Flipkart App to try it out. Slides and Link for the talk by my team at SlashN2015.

item.title: Neural Network based Recommender System for e-commerce
item.description: A recommendation engine that is a hybrid of collaborative filtering and content based techniques

item.title: Visual Semantic Embeddings for e-commerce products
item.description: Multimodal Neural Network that embeds images and associated text into the same metric space. More details coming soon.

item.title: Deep Learning based Product Matching
item.description: Siamese Network that maps similar products closer and dissimilar ones far apart in a metric space

item.title: Doc-OCR
item.description: Automatic Document Verification using OCR + substring match

item.title: Semi-Automatic Background Removal Tool
item.description: A Semi-Automatic background removal tool which uses Geodesic Distance Transform. Code to be released soon.
